Document summary: This document is an application submitted by Kauai Island Utility Cooperative (KIUC) for approval of a Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) for As-Available Energy with Kapaa Solar LLC. The document also requests the inclusion of costs in KIUC's Energy Rate Adjustment Clause. The PPA includes terms and conditions for KIUC to purchase energy from Kapaa Solar's Facility, which is an approximately 1 MWac photovoltaic generation plant located in Kapaa, Hawaii. The document seeks approval from the Hawaii Public Utilities Commission for various requests and relief sought by KIUC.
Suggested title v2: 08-03-2020 PPA Approval Application for Kapaa Solar (Hawaii)
Suggested title v3: 08-03-2020 Application for Approval of Power Purchase Agreement (Hawaii)
